use_cases_desc: Integrating physical objects into the digital workflow
contribution_desc: Integrates physical objects on a desk into the digital environment, specifically paper integrated into the desktop. Tracks using an overhead projector and camera.
tracking_characteristic: Outside-in tracking; Location 2D; Orientation; Tracking devices only;
interaction_techniques: Conduit gestures; Cross-device task chaining; Visualisation; Data transfer/sharing
